project.description: Run the benchmark tasks on the most recent dev or stg AMI. This set of tests can take from 20 to 30 hours to complete.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Delete the previous repo clone directories rm -rf li origin-dev-tools
# Clone the repos git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/origin-dev-tools.git
pushd li
# Launch a test instance build/devenv launch devenv_benchmark_${BUILD_NUMBER} --verifier --branch $branch $launch_params
test_params="" if $profile_broker then test_params=$test_params" --profile-broker" fi echo $test_params
# Run the image tests build/devenv test devenv_benchmark_${BUILD_NUMBER} --include_cucumber=benchmark --disable-charlie --mcollective-logs --terminate $test_params
popd
